enb_long_title: Fortieth session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-40)
sentences: This session (10-13 May 2011, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates) focused primarily on follow-up actions to the IAC Review.
The Panel established an Executive Committee, adopted a COI Policy and introduced several changes to the procedures for IPCC reports.
The Panel also considered progress on AR5 .
